biotools.summary: The tool includes a format specification for RNA-Seq data that provides confidentially-aware; data summaries as well as several tools for performing common analyses: expression measurements (e.g. RPKMs), creation of signal tracks, segmentation, annotation manipulations, etc.

bioschemas.name: RSEQtools
bioschemas.summary: The tool includes a format specification for RNA-Seq data that provides confidentially-aware; data summaries as well as several tools for performing common analyses: expression measurements (e.g. RPKMs), creation of signal tracks, segmentation, annotation manipulations, etc.
